kv8.9:1.1: ☑ Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalanti?
kv8.9:1.3: Sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:1.5: nanu anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:1.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.9:2.1: ☑ Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.3: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.12: paññā kusalā sārammaṇā, atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.14: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.1: ☑ Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.3: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.5: kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.14: paññā kusalā anārammaṇā, natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:4.1: ☑ Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalanti?
kv8.9:4.3: Yaṃ kiñci kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ kusalanti?

kv8.9:9.5: kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ phassavippayuttaṃ kusalanti?

kv8.9:13.5: nanu anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:14.1: ☑ Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:14.12: paññā kusalā sārammaṇā, atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:15.5: kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ vacīkammaṃ rūpaṃ kusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:15.14: paññā kusalā anārammaṇā, natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:16.3: Yaṃ kiñci kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ kusalanti?
kv8.9:17.1: ☑ Akusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ akusalanti?
kv8.9:17.3: Sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:17.5: nanu anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:17.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhi;
kv8.9:18.1: ☑ Akusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso akusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:18.3: Akusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:18.17: anottappaṃ akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:18.19: Akusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ kāyakammaṃ rūpaṃ akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:19.19: anottappaṃ akusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:25.14: vāyodhātu asuci assu lohitaṃ sedo akusaloti?

kv8.9:26.12: vāyodhātu asuci assu lohitaṃ sedo abyākatoti?

kv8.9:32.14: Akusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṃ vacīkammaṃ rūpaṃ anārammaṇaṃ phassavippayuttaṃ abyākatanti?
kv8.9:33.6: Hañci kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ kusalampi akusalampi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv8.9:34.19: vāyodhātu asuci assu lohitaṃ sedo kusalopi akusalopīti?
kv8.9:37.5: cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
kv8.9:38.4: “kāye vā, ānanda, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ;
kv8.9:38.5: vācāya vā, ānanda, sati vacīsañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ;
kv8.9:38.6: mane vā, ānanda, sati manosañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhan”ti.
kv8.9:39.4: “tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ;
kv8.9:39.5: catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ;
kv8.9:39.6: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā akusalaṃ manokammaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ;
kv8.9:39.7: tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ;
kv8.9:39.8: catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā kusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ;
kv8.9:39.9: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā kusalaṃ manokammaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākan”ti.
kv8.9:40.4: “sacāyaṃ, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākareyya—
kv8.9:40.5: ‘sañcetaniyaṃ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṃ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā sukhavedaniyaṃ sukhaṃ so vedayati;
kv8.9:40.6: sañcetaniyaṃ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṃ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā dukkhavedaniyaṃ dukkhaṃ so vedayati;
kv8.9:40.7: sañcetaniyaṃ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṃ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ so vedayatī’ti, evaṃ byākaramāno kho, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
